mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.model_id AS modelId, m.field AS field, m.item_label AS itemLabel,m.priority AS priority, m.def_value AS defValue, m.opt_value AS optValue, m.help AS help, m.unit AS unit, m.date_format AS dateFormat,m.data_type AS dataType,m.is_custom AS isCustom, m.is_display AS isDisplay, m.is_required AS isRequired,m.is_judge AS isJudge,m.is_child AS isChild, m.item_version AS itemVersion FROM model_item m INNER JOIN org_model o ON o.model_id = m.model_id WHERE o.org_id = #{ orgId }
select MIN(priority) AS max FROM model_item WHERE model_id = #{model_id} AND data_type = #{dataType}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM model_item WHERE model_id IN (SELECT o.model_id FROM org_model o WHERE o.org_id= #{ orgId })
